org.dlw.ai.blackboard.util
Class StringTrimmer

java.lang.Object
  org.dlw.ai.blackboard.util.StringTrimmer

public final class StringTrimmer
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to provide string utility functions for trimming String objects.

Version:
1.0.0-RC
Author:
David L. Whitehurst
